exec mkdir -p .git
exec forge config dump --pretty ./dir1/dir2/blueprint.cue
cmpenv stdout golden.txt

-- golden.txt --
{
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "ci": {
    "global": {
      "registry": "test",
      "satellite": ""
    },
    "secrets": {},
    "targets": {
      "test": {
        "args": {},
        "privileged": true,
        "retries": 3,
        "secrets": []
      }
    }
  }
}
-- dir1/dir2/blueprint.cue --
version: "1.0"
ci: {
  targets: {
      test: {
          privileged: true
      }
  }
}
-- dir1/blueprint.cue --
version: "1.0"
ci: {
  targets: {
      test: {
          retries: 3
      }
  }
}
-- blueprint.cue --
version: "1.0"
ci: {
  global: {
    registry: "test"
  }
}
